member.name: T:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Image.Page.BitmapRenderersFactory
member.summary: Factory with .NET Core based image renderer.

member.name: T:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Image.Page.ImageRendering
member.summary: Implements rendering of to bitmap image of specified format.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Image.Page.ImageRenderingSettings.DpiX
member.summary: Horizontal resolution of result image in pixels per inch.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Image.Page.ImageRenderingSettings.DpiY
member.summary: Vertical resolution of result image in pixels per inch.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Image.Page.ImageRenderingSettings.TiffCompression
member.summary: Gets or sets the TIFF compression type

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Image.Page.ImageRenderingSettings.JpegQuality
member.summary: Specifies the desired image fidelity. 0 indicates the lowest possible fidelity. 100 specifies the highest fidelity.

members.member: Specifies whether the image should be dithered when saving to a black and white output format, like CCITT3. This property has no effect if the TiffCompression property is set to Rle, Lzw or None(represents color output).

member.name: T:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Image.Page.TiffCompressionType
member.summary: Specifies the Tagged Image File Format (TIFF) compression options
